      • onFeatureSupportResult

        void onFeatureSupportResult(java.lang.String featureId,
                            int result,
                            android.os.Bundle resultInfo)
        Callback for the result from checking feature support.
        Parameters:
        featureId - Id of the feature for which we're checking support.
        result - Result of the feature support check.
        resultInfo - Additional info about the level of support for the feature. Can be null.
